issue.title: [Packaging] Fix CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR in release verification script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4237](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4237). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Set to

`-DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib`

instead of

`-DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=$ARROW_HOME/lib`
